version_description: - Fixed an issue where the app would close shortly after opening on certain devices.

• New and improved store! You can now preview each sound in a pack before purchasing.
• Full-screen mode is now easier to use - tap the playing sound to see its artwork image full-screen, and tap the image to go back to the list of sounds.

• Control sound volume independently of phone volume
• Nightlight provides background lighting synchronized to sounds

Lots of exciting new improvements in this version!
• You can mark your favorite sounds to see them at the top of the list!
• When headphones are unplugged audio pauses automatically
• Fixed an issue causing the app to close shortly after opening

Rain Rain 4 is here!
• Save mixes to your favorites
• New layout lets you more easily access your favorites
• Pre-made mixes are now available in the main library
• The mixer is now even easier to use

Rain Rain 4.1 resolves an issue where the controls could stop responding after receiving a call, alarm, or other alert, as well as a few other minor bugs. Enjoy!

version_description:
Rain Rain 5.1 is here!
• Rain Rain is now available in French, Spanish, and Italian
• The mixer is now even easier to use
• Your Favorite Mixes are even easier to browse
• Fixed a crash where iOS 8 users were unable to use the Sleep Timer

Rain Rain 5.2 fixes a problem where the app would close just after opening. Updates from 5.1:
• Rain Rain is now available in French, Spanish, and Italian
• The mixer is now even easier to use
• Your Favorite Mixes are even easier to browse
•

What's New in Rain Rain 5.3:
• The mixer has been redesigned to be even easier to use, with new animations and graphics
• Lots of graphical interface improvements throughout Rain Rain
• Support for iPhone X and iOS 11
• New Bedtime Reminder me

What's New in Rain Rain 5.4:
• Fixed a crash on iOS 9.0, 9.1 and 9.2
• Various graphical refinements
• Fixed the 3D Touch App Shortcut for playing favorites from your home screen
• Fixed a bug where audio might stop unexpectedly
• Performan

What's New in Rain Rain 5.5:
• Fixed a crash on iOS 9
• Various graphical refinements
• Fixed the 3D Touch App Shortcut for playing favorites from your home screen
• Fixed a bug where audio might stop unexpectedly
• Performance improvements

Rain Rain 5.6 is here! What's new:
• Search - You can now search sounds and mixes to find what you want to listen to faster than ever
• Immersive browsing experience - Now, as you scroll down in the Library, the controls slide away giving you even m

Rain Rain 5.7 is here! What's new:
• Search - You can now search sounds and mixes to find what you want to listen to faster than ever
• New, more streamlined Mixer, especially when only one sound is playing
• Visual improvements
• Sleep Timer

Rain Rain 5.8 now available! Here's what's new:
• Big Picture mode. View beautiful, HD images of your favorite sounds while you listen to them.
• A new Settings menu. You can now choose to show the track volume even when only one track is playing,

Rain Rain 6.4 is a minor update that resolves issues related to audio playback and crashes experienced by some users. Thank you to everybody for your suggestions and feedback and special thanks to my TestFlight Beta Test team.

Rain Rain 6 is here, and it's the best Rain Rain yet!
• Siri Shortcuts support: Favorite sounds and mixes can be added to Siri by tapping the heart icon again. Recently played sounds and mixes can also be found in Siri settings and in the Shortcuts app

• New Oscillator feature, which lets you fade sounds in and out for a more dynamic experience. Try using Oscillate with multiple sounds in the Mixer for limitless combinations!
• Easier access to Big Picture
